@graph.name: Vegan Pasta Sauce with Sun-Dried Tomatoes - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: This vegan pasta sauce with sun-dried tomatoes is super creamy, packed with flavor, and so easy to make! If you like creamy pasta dishes you will love it!

@graph.headline: Vegan Pasta Sauce with Sun-Dried Tomatoes
@graph.keywords: sun dried tomato pasta,sun dried tomato sauce,vegan pasta sauce

@graph.name: Vegan Pasta Sauce with Sun-Dried Tomatoes
@graph.description: This vegan pasta sauce with sun-dried tomatoes is super creamy, packed with flavor, and so easy to make! If you like creamy pasta dishes you will love it!

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all of the ingredients for the sauce in a high speed blender and blend on high until smooth. This should take about a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine all of the ingredients for the sauce in a high speed blender and blend on high until smooth. This should take about a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the sauce into a large pan and heat on low heat. Stir with a wooden spoon.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the sauce into a large pan and heat on low heat. Stir with a wooden spoon.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cooked pasta and stir until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cooked pasta and stir until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately. If you want you could add some thinly sliced sun-dried tomatoes, fresh oregano, and red pepper flakes on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately. If you want you could add some thinly sliced sun-dried tomatoes, fresh oregano, and red pepper flakes on top.

@graph.keywords: sun dried tomato pasta, sun dried tomato sauce, vegan pasta sauce
